thread.title: Surfside Tiara wins Anoakia Stakes at Santa Anita
thread.title_full: Surfside Tiara wins Anoakia Stakes at Santa Anita - Yahoo Sports

author: yahoo
title: Surfside Tiara wins Anoakia Stakes at Santa Anita
text:
Done ARCADIA, Calif. (AP) -- Surfside Tiara rallied in the final furlong to win the $70,000 Anoakia Stakes for 2-year-old fillies by a half-length Sunday at Santa Anita.
Ridden by Rafael Bejarano, Surfside Tiara ran six furlongs in 1:10.84 and paid $7.60, $4.40 and $3.20 as the 5-2 third choice in a field of seven.
Uptown Twirl returned $7.60 and $3.60, while Find Joy was another 6 1/2 lengths back in third and paid $6.80 to show at 29-1 odds.
The victory, worth $44,100, increased Surfside Tiara's career earnings to $96,350, with two wins in four starts. It was her first stakes win for Hall of Fame trainer Jerry Hollendorfer.
Sports & Recreation Horse Racing Rafael Bejarano   665/79545   83/5681   23/10000
